summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed individual to appear in person on November 29, 2021, to testify and give evidence in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330). The subpoena is signed by the United States Attorney and an Assistant United States Attorney.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330) for which the subpoena is issued to compel testimony and evidence.

persons.name: A. Rey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands an unnamed individual to appear in person before the United States District Court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The subpoena is dated and issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

locations: United States District Court for the Southern District of New York, 40 Foley Square, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 13, 2021, compelling an unnamed individual to appear in court on November 29, 2021, to testify in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
The subpoena is for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, docket number 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the individual to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena was issued by United States Attorney A. Rey Strauss for the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case as of mid-2021, with the court compelling witness testimony.
